"Oh! Would you look who it is!": "Ugh, this gear has seen better days. I'm definitely starting to feel it."
"Oh, Kukka readied this for me? Yeah, this is perfect!"
"This'll make my survey go so much easier. I'll have to tell Kukka I owe him one."
"Thanks to you as well for delivering it!"
"Hm? You heading back to the lodge? Hold on a sec."
"Can you give this to Meri while you're at it?"
"Nice, ain't it? I got it in this area."
"She's always taking care of us, you know? Figured I'd give her a little something as thanks."
"I've still got some areas left to survey, so I thought I'd ask you to give it to her. Thanks again!"
